original_text: The name of the third river is the Tigris; it runs along the east side of Ashur. And the fourth river is the Euphrates.
korean_text: 셋째 강의 이름은 힛데겔이라 앗수르 동쪽으로 흘렀으며 넷째 강은 유브라데더라

sentences.original_text: The name of the third river is the Tigris
it runs along the east side of Ashur
sentences.korean_translation: 그것은 앗수르의 동쪽 지역을 따라 흐른다

sentences.original_text: And the fourth river is the Euphrates
